full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 225 of 236 1129 LC3Cmax7 Dawson - cross behind tab 1 in that folder. 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. Why don't you take a moment to review it, and in 3 particular, the second page of that document, the end of the 4 first paragraph and the full second paragraph. Take a minute 5 to read it all. 6 A. I read the first two paragraphs of the back page. 7 Q. Does that refresh your recollection about being involved in 8 a burglary investigation -- 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. It does? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. So it is true, then, that you were involved in a burglary 13 investigation at Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach residence at 358 El 14 Brillo Way in Palm Beach in October 2003; is that right? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And that was roughly two years before the search warrant 17 that you discussed on your direct testimony; right? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. And, in fact, you interviewed the perpetrator in the 20 burglary case; isn't that right? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. And his name was Juan Alessi; is that right? 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. And on October 15th of 2003, you and a fellow detective 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018326
